raw_title: Rev. Sister MARY CINTHIA A.C. (nee HYACINTH BLOSSOM EMMANUEL)
raw_body: Rev. Sister MARY CINTHIA A.C. (nee HYACINTH BLOSSOM EMMANUEL) was called to her Eternal Rest on Monday,​ 25th September 2023. Requiem Mass will be held at St. Joseph’s Convent,​ Trincomalee,​ on Wednesday,​ 27th September 2023 at 8.30 a.m. followed by interment at General Cemetery,​ Trincomalee. (Carmel Convent,​ 88,​ Ananda Rajakaruna Mawatha,​ Colombo 10).061087
